feed.title: Mystacina Solutions
feed.subtitle: Ready to take your life projects to new heights? At Mystacina Solutions, we're here to help you soar.

entry.title: Map
entry.content:
This is an example post with some geojson code. The support is provided thanks to Leaflet. To create your own visualization, go to geojson.io.

```geojson
{
  "type": "FeatureCollection",
  "features": [
    {
      "type": "Feature",
      "properties": {},
      "geometry": {
        "type": "Point",
        "coordinates": [175.496847, -40.357404]
      }
    }
  ]
}



Which generates:

```geojson
{
  "type": "FeatureCollection",
  "features": [
    {
      "type": "Feature",
      "properties": {},
      "geometry": {
        "type": "Point",
        "coordinates": [175.496847, -40.357404]
      }
    }
  ]
}
entry.summary: A map to celebrate our website opening
